speaker: Cellar
lines: You descend to a cool cellar of barrels and bottles.
A chalk line marks the floor by the wall.
A trapdoor sits open to the stair.
A small stone door sits half-hidden.
You hear a dry cough from the dark.
The air smells of herbs and spilled drink.
A ladder rises toward a bookcase door.

choices.text: Kick a crate and see who complains.
